name: Live Charts UI Kit for Figma
description:
Production-ready React.js charts in Figma!

View live example


Use our UI kit to build fast, well designed dashboards.

It's super easy -

  1. Use popular open source charts, available in Anima plugin and on this file
  2. Design it to fit your application within Figma
  3. Export ready-to-use React code and use it in your application


Learn more on our blog post
